content.text: What's up? I'm going to get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift.
Hey! Just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks! What do you do for a living?
I'm a Christmas tree decorator. I love nature and my garden is a big part of that. What do you do for fun?
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice. I also love floating the river. It's so relaxing.
That sounds really fun! I love being outdoors. I haven't gone home in over two years. I live on the road and decorate Christmas trees all over the country.
Oh wow, that's amazing! How do you stay sane living on the road all the time?
It's not always easy, but I love my job and I get to see so many new places. I also love meeting new people. I'm not sure what I would do if I ever had to stop decorating trees.
I can see why you love your job! It sounds like you have a lot of fun. I'm glad you get to meet new people. I love meeting new people too.
Me too! It's so interesting to learn about different cultures and ways of life.
I agree! It's one of my favorite things about traveling.
Me too! I'm so glad we met.
